author: cnbc.com
title: Social Capital Hedosophia Holdings Corp. Announces Informal Event for Investors and Appointment of Directors
text:
PALO ALTO, Calif., Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Social Capital Hedosophia Holdings Corp. (NYSE: IPOA) (the "Company") today announced that it will host an informal event for investors on Thursday, February 8, 2018. At around 5:15 p.m. EST, the Company will discuss general trends in the global technology sector.
Investors who wish to access the live discussion can find dial-in information and related materials on the Investor Relations section of the Company's website at
